00011 #include <QObject>
00012 #include <QVBoxLayout>
00013 #include <QHBoxLayout>
00014 #include <QSizePolicy>
00015 
00016 LibrarySearchWidget::LibrarySearchWidget(LibraryHandler *parent,
00017                 LibraryData* dataModel): 
00018 QWidget(parent),
00019 searchLabel_(tr("Enter search word"), this), 
00020 searchWordEdit_(this),
00021 typeBox_(this), 
00022 vlnvBox_(this),
00023 hideShowCheckBox_(tr("Show hidden items"), this),
00024 filter_(this),
00025 view_(parent, &filter_, this) {
00026 
00027         // set LibraryData as the source model for the filter
00028         filter_.setSourceModel(dataModel);
00029 
00030         // set filter to be used as  source model for the table view
00031         view_.setModel(&filter_);
00032 
00033         // set up the layout for the widget
00034         setupLayout();
00035 
00036         // connect the signals between the GUI items in the widget
00037         setupConnections();
00038 
00039         // connect the custom view signals to the data model
00040         connectDataModel(dataModel);
00041 }
00042 
00043 LibrarySearchWidget::~LibrarySearchWidget() {
00044 }
00045 
00046 void LibrarySearchWidget::setupLayout() {
00047 
00048         // create the top layout for the widget
00049         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00050 
00051         // add the label and the line edit to set search word
00052         topLayout->addWidget(&searchLabel_, 0);
00053         topLayout->addWidget(&searchWordEdit_, 0);
00054 
00055         // create horizontal layout for the two group boxes to be side by side
00056         QHBoxLayout* groupLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00057 
00058         // add the group boxes
00059         groupLayout->addWidget(&typeBox_, 0);
00060         groupLayout->addWidget(&vlnvBox_, 0);
00061 
00062         // add the horizontal layout to the top layout
00063         topLayout->addLayout(groupLayout);
00064 
00065         // create layout to set the addItemButton and checkBox to be side by side
00066         QHBoxLayout* buttonCheckLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00067 
00068         // add the check box
00069         buttonCheckLayout->addWidget(&hideShowCheckBox_, 0);
00070 
00071         // add the layout to top layout
00072         topLayout->addLayout(buttonCheckLayout);
00073 
00074         // finally add the table view and set the it to be the only stretching item
00075         // in this widget
00076         topLayout->addWidget(&view_, 1);
00077 }
00078 
00079 void LibrarySearchWidget::setupConnections() {
00080 
00081         // connect the checkBox to filter
00082         connect(&hideShowCheckBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)),
00083                         &filter_, SLOT(onShowStatusChange(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00084 
00085         // connect the search word line edit to filter
00086         connect(&searchWordEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(const QString&)),
00087                         &filter_, SLOT(onSearchWordChanged(const QString&)),
00088                         Qt::UniqueConnection);
00089 
00090         // connect the document type checkbox group to filter
00091         connect(&typeBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(
00092                         const TypeBox::TypeSearchSettings*)),
00093                         &filter_, SLOT(onTypeStateChanged(
00094                                         const TypeBox::TypeSearchSettings*)),
00095                         Qt::UniqueConnection);
00096 
00097         // connect the vlnv element checkBox to filter
00098         connect(&vlnvBox_, SIGNAL(stateChanged(
00099                         const VLNVBox::VLNVSearchSettings*)),
00100                         &filter_, SLOT(onVLNVStateChanged(
00101                                         const VLNVBox::VLNVSearchSettings*)),
00102                         Qt::UniqueConnection);
00103 
00104 }
